intro: Sinosenecio globigerus, commonly known as the globigerous sinosenecio, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or mountainous regions, preferring well-drained soils and sunny exposures. Its leaves are usually narrow and grass-like, while its flowers are small and clustered in a spherical shape. This species is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
